result.eng: But did he really go around the world?

result.eng: Isn't this the best dictionary in the world?
result.ga: Nach seo an foclóir is fearr ar domhan

result.html: Nach seo an foclóir is fearr ar domhanIsn't this the best dictionary in the world?
result.ponchtml: Naċ seo an foclóir is fearr ar doṁanIsn't this the best dictionary in the world?

result.eng: You will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ga: Beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.orig: Beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhan
result.html: Beidh tú ar an chailín is áille ar domhanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú ar an ċailín is áille ar doṁanYou will be the most beautiful girl in the world.

result.eng: Czech beer is the best in the world.
result.ga: Beoir na Seice an bheoir is fearr ar domhan

result.eng: When I came to the world.
result.ga: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saol
result.orig: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saol
result.html: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ṫáinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.

result.eng: I don't believe in the other world.
result.ga: Ní chreidim ar an saol eile
result.orig: Ní chreidim ar an saol eile
result.html: Ní chreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.

result.eng: He broke the world record.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé an churiarracht dhomhanda
result.orig: Sháraigh sé an churiarracht dhomhanda
result.html: Sháraigh sé an churiarracht dhomhandaHe broke the world record.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé an ċuriarraċt ḋoṁandaHe broke the world record.

result.eng: The whole world knows who you are.
result.ga: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.html: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.

result.eng: The ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.
result.ga: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta
result.orig: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta

result.ponchtml: Tá an gnáṫẛaol róġránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríoċtaThe ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.

result.eng: She is famous all over the world.
result.ga: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.orig: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.html: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhainShe is famous all over the world.
result.ponchtml: Tá cáil uirṫi ar fud an doṁainShe is famous all over the world.

result.eng: London is one of the largest cities in the world.

result.ponchtml: Tá Londain ar na caṫraċa is mó ar doṁanLondon is one of the largest cities in the world.

result.eng: She was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.

result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin

result.ponchtml: Is beag duine ar doṁan gur cuiṁin leis lá an ḋúnṁaraiṫe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.

result.eng: To wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ga: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.orig: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.html: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ponchtml: Cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mór go háiriṫe ar ṫíorṫa a raiḃ ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
